cui_name: Congenital atresia of extrahepatic bile duct
reasoning: Reporting incidence of biliary atresia at approximately 0.7 per 100k births (1 in 8,000-15,000 live births). Global incidence shows geographic variation with higher rates in East Asia.
source: Chardot C et al. (2006). Epidemiology of biliary atresia in France: a national study 1986-96. J Hepatol. 31(6):1006-13
